common_2070_rival_02:
I’m so glad we juuust managed to get everything
ready for the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Academy Ace Tournament[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_09:
Oh yeah—that’s what we decided to officially
name the tournament! It’s a good name, right?\r
Fitting, memorable?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_10:
But then Arven went and said we should call it
the “School Battle Brawl”...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_11:
And then even Director Clavell got into calling it
that, so now I’m just like...agh![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Anyway, how you feelin’, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?
In the\r
mindset\r
to do\r
some winning?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_04a:
There’s that enthusiasm! Show us what a
Champion’s made of![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_04b:
Pffft, ha! The old “nooo, I’m still sleepy” routine?
Good joke![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_05:
It’s so cool that La Primera’s gonna make a guest
appearance, thanks to your hard work![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_06:
I wish I didn’t have my hands full with all the
behind-the-scenes admin stuff.\c
I won’t even get to do any battling myself...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_07:
But I’ll seize the chance to do some objective
research into what makes YOU so good![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2070_rival_08:
Anyway, let’s get going. I’ll meet you at the
front desk in the entrance hall! No stalling![VAR 0114(0004)]
